tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE treatment_plans (
  client_id INT,
  plan_id INT,
 plan_details STRING
)

CREATE TABLE client_treatment_plans (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_plan TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name TEXT,
  treatment_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  treatment_id INT,
  appointment_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE TreatmentPlan (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
  treatment_description TEXT,
  treatment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Client (
  client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_name VARCHAR(50),
  client_age INT,
  client_gender VARCHAR(10),
  client_contact VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentHistory (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  client_id INT,
  therapist_id INT,
  treatment_id INT,
  treatment_date DATE,
  treatment_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentPlan (
    plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_id INT,
    plan_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Client (
    client_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    client_name VARCHAR(50),
    client_age INT,
    client_gender VARCHAR(10),
    client_address TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentTask (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_id INT,
    task_description TEXT,
    due_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE TreatmentGoal (
    goal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_id INT,
    goal_description TEXT,
    target_date DATE,
    completed BOOLEAN
);
